title: How long does it take to get from level 1 - 30?

replies.body: Depends on how much you are willing to spend :3
takes about 300-400 normal games to get to 30

If you have no life like Twitch streamers you cant binge 3 days with xp boost. not sure if they sleep + eat more than 4 hours but they do it.
(took me about a year only playing a couple games a week back in season 1, not sure if its still the same xp)
Depends what method you use to level up really.
I'm not proud of it but it took me 663 Intermediate Diff. Bot Games to get to it.
It takes one hundred and forty one hours, 36 minutes and 13 seconds :)
